General.Name: Kingfisher Metals Corp
General.Description: Kingfisher Metals Corp., a junior mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in British Columbia, Canada. The company primarily explores for gold, copper, silver, and zinc deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Ecstall property covering 20,735 hectares located in Northwest British Columbia; the Goldrange project covering 51,000 hectares located in Central British Columbia; the Thibert project covering 12,475 hectares located to the north of Dease Lake; and the HWY 37 project covering 36,200 hectares located in Northwest British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Seashore Resource Partners Corp. Kingfisher Metals Corp. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1050 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3S7
